function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in mobilizing personal protective equipment at the time of crisis","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare workers and patients being exposed to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Effective supply chain management for PPE, stockpiling of essential equipment, and exploring alternative sources of PPE production","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, inventory tracking technology, and alternative production methods for PPE","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and emergency response teams","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, government agencies, and emergency response organizations"},{"Description":"Shortage of hospital beds and medical equipment","Impact":"Overloading of healthcare facilities and inability to provide adequate care to patients","Mitigation":"Rapid expansion of healthcare infrastructure, real-time monitoring of bed availability, and strategic deployment of medical equipment","Technologies":"Real-time monitoring systems, telemedicine platforms, and modular healthcare infrastructure","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and public health authorities","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, government agencies, and private sector healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Inadequate protocols for identifying, transporting, and managing COVID-19 positive cases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and ineffective patient care","Mitigation":"Development of comprehensive protocols for case identification, safe transportation, and effective management, along with training for healthcare personnel","Technologies":"Smart medical logistics systems, AI-assisted patient management, and telehealth platforms","People":"COVID-19 patients, healthcare workers, and the general public","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare facilities, and medical logistics organizations"}]}
